abstract: Nebraskaland meat distribution company in Hunts Point section of Bronx has voluntarily been introducing higher wage floor to $15 per hour, regardless of whether state politicians decide to raise New York's minimum wage; experience of company in last year illustrates both challenges and benefits of higher minimum wage.
lead_paragraph: While Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo pushes for a higher hourly wage, the experience of one business illustrates the impact that such an increase could have on many companies.

headline.main: As New York Debates $15 Minimum Wage, a Bronx Company Makes It a Reality
headline.print_headline: As Albany Debates $15 Wage, Bronx Company Makes It a Reality

snippet: While Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo pushes for a higher hourly wage, the experience of one business illustrates the impact that such an increase could have on many companies.
